diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $SA$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $SB$ is $x$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $S$ and $B$.
The line connecting $S$ and $C$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
The line connecting $A$ and $B$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $S$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
